name: Distilling Extractor
description:
The Distilling Extractor has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.
Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

name: Titan Extractor
description:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect resources.
Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

name: Distilling Extractor Prime
description:
The Distilling Extractor Prime has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.
Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect large amounts of resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

name: Titan Extractor Prime
description:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect large amounts of resources.
Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

name: Alpha Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Gilded Illumination
description: Illumination, crafted by Ostron glassworkers, fashioned and gilded to aesthetic perfection.

name: Caged Condroc
description: A bird of prey to accompany you aboard the Orbiter.

name: Temple Flesh
description: A small sample of sacred Temple flesh, iconic export of Cetus.

name: Reclamator Balloon
description: One of Cetus' signature sights, in miniature.

name: Xartaan Lamp
description: Turquoise glass suspended in a handmade gilded basket, filled with bioluminescence.

name: Caged Kuaka
description: A small rodent of Earthly origin to keep you company aboard the Orbiter.

name: Thousand-Year Fish Statuette
description: A glass carving depicting the colossal Thousand-Year Fish of Ostron legend.

name: Glappid Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Norg Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Cuthol Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Pedestal Prime
description: Behold, the singular vision of a great artist and the life’s work of a master craftsmen. An artifact so refined, so imbued with the finest material that it has no equal in this system. This is the plinth that all others aspire to be. This is Pedestal Prime.

name: Display - Tennocon 2018
description: Bestowed upon those who joined together in celebration at TennoCon 2018.

name: Wyrm
description:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Taxon
description:
With 'Retarget' and 'Molecular Conversion' as its default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Shade
description:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Prisma Shade
description: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

name: Helios
description:
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Djinn
description:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Dethcube
description:
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Carrier
description:
With 'Striker' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Diriga
description:
Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Chesa Kubrow
description: This Kubrow will disarm adversaries and retrieve the spoils of battle.

name: Sunika Kubrow
description: Once the value of Orokin guard-pets had been realized, Orokin scientists began experimenting with strains designed for combat. These were no longer household pets but superior war animals bred for ferocity and aggression.

name: Raksa Kubrow
description: Designed by the Orokin to be the perfect companion, a Kubrow was never far from its master's side. Loyal and obedient, these creatures made ideal bodyguards. Equipped with shield generators for added protection, their fierce growl could paralyze any attacker with fear.

name: Huras Kubrow
description: Prized for its ability to sneak up on unsuspecting prey, the Huras Kubrow were first used as hunting companions by the Orokin elite. Orokin Era Tenno soon adapted the strain for use in covert missions and assassinations.

name: Helminth Charger
description: An Infested pet bred from the Helminth Cyst

name: Sahasa Kubrow
description: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.

name: Adarza Kavat
description: Piercing eyes reflect deadly instincts.

name: Smeeta Kavat
description: This sly feline is playful yet devious.

name: Amesha
description: Transform into a winged guardian.

abilities.name: Watchful Swarm
abilities.description: Tiny drones orbit the Warframe or an ally, and intercept enemy fire.

abilities.name: Benevolent Decoy
abilities.description: Creates beacons that draw enemy fire, converting the damage into healing pulses.

abilities.name: Warding Grace
abilities.description: Renders the Warframe and nearby allies immune to Status Effects, while slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Vengeful Rush
abilities.description: All damage taken is transformed into Energy, while abilities gain enhanced Range, Duration and Power. Affects the Warframe and nearby allies.

name: Itzal
description: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: The Itzal Archwing teleports a short distance, dropping all enemy target locks.

abilities.name: Penumbra
abilities.description: Activates a cloaking field that hides the Warframe and any nearby allies who remain stationary.

abilities.name: Cosmic Crush
abilities.description: Forms a miniature black hole that sucks in all nearby objects before rupturing in a massive shock wave.

abilities.name: Fighter Escort
abilities.description: Deploys drones that fight alongside the Warframe, each detonating in a destructive blast when killed.

name: Odonata
description: The systems built into this Archwing balance offensive capabilities with defensive countermeasures.

abilities.name: Energy Shell
abilities.description: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe

abilities.name: Disarray
abilities.description: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.

abilities.name: Seeking Fire
abilities.description: Fires a large volley of homing missiles.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: The Warframe emits a massive pulse of energy, stunning nearby enemies and sending them flying.

name: Elytron
description: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.

abilities.name: Bloomer
abilities.description: Fires a high-yield, remotely detonated explosive projectile capable of latching onto targets.

abilities.name: Core Vent
abilities.description: Vents out the Archwing's propulsion core, confusing enemy projectiles and causing them to detonate.

abilities.name: Thumper
abilities.description: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.

abilities.name: Warhead
abilities.description: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.

name: Fluctus
description: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.

name: Grattler
description: Shatter your targets with explosive shells from this devastating Archwing cannon.

name: Velocitus
description: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

name: Corvas
description: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.

name: Imperator
description: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.

name: Dual Decurion
description: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.

name: Phaedra
description: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.

name: Cyngas
description: Unload deadly accurate bursts of mayhem.

name: Prisma Veritux
description: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

name: Knux
description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.

name: Centaur
description: Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.

name: Veritux
description: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.

name: Onorix
description: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.

name: Agkuza
description: Tear apart incoming enemies with this massive hooked blade.

name: Kaszas
description: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.

name: Rathbone
description: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.

name: Equinox
description: Split between day and night, Equinox manifests aggressive and defensive forms at will.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Switch forms, temporarily gaining bonus shields and armor in Night-Form, or bonus damage and speed in Day-Form.

abilities.name: Rest & Rage
abilities.description: In Night Form targets are put to sleep. In Day Form targets become more vulnerable to damage.

abilities.name: Pacify & Provoke
abilities.description: In Night Form reduces damage inflicted by nearby enemies. In Day Form increases Ability Strength of nearby allies.

abilities.name: Mend & Maim
abilities.description: In Night Form, allies are healed with each nearby enemy killed. In Day Form, nearby enemies are bled and then subjected to a wave of slashing force.

name: Volt
description: Volt can create and harness electrical elements. This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Speed
abilities.description: Gain a brief boost of movement speed which affects all allies in range.

abilities.name: Electric Shield
abilities.description: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

abilities.name: Discharge
abilities.description: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.

name: Trinity
description: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technology are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.

abilities.name: Well Of Life
abilities.description: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.

abilities.name: Energy Vampire
abilities.description: Allies will gain energy over time when enemies are marked with Energy Vampire.

abilities.name: Link
abilities.description: Any damage taken while Link is active will be channeled to a nearby enemy.

abilities.name: Blessing
abilities.description: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity's affinity aura while giving them some damage resistance.

name: Vauban
description: The highly tactical Vauban uses his powers to create deadly traps that can zap, imprison and dimensionally crush enemies.

abilities.name: Tesla
abilities.description: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.

abilities.name: Minelayer
abilities.description: Cycle through four deployable trap mines: Bounce, Trip Laser, Shred and Concuss.

abilities.name: Bastille
abilities.description: Creates an energy-based containment field in which captives are held suspended in stasis.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter

name: Zephyr
description: Specializing in air attacks and mobility, Zephyr dominates from above.

abilities.name: Tail Wind
abilities.description: From the ground, charge and release to launch Zephyr into an airborne hover. From the air, tap to dash forward, or aim down to dive bomb enemies below.

abilities.name: Airburst
abilities.description: Generate a burst of massively dense air that explodes on contact and sends enemies flying. Launch Airbursts into Tornadoes to make them grow.

abilities.name: Turbulence
abilities.description: Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Create deadly tornadoes that seek out and engulf enemies. Tornadoes deal the elemental damage type they absorb the most. Shoot enemies engulfed in Tornadoes to do additional damage.

name: Saryn
description: Saryn's venomous attacks are horrifyingly effective against organic and synthetic enemies, and her ability to 'shed' her skin makes her very elusive.

abilities.name: Spores
abilities.description: Inflict a target with a pox of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.

abilities.name: Molt
abilities.description: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

abilities.name: Toxic Lash
abilities.description: While active, attacks deal additional <DT_POISON>Toxin damage; this effect is doubled for melee strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Release a poisonous miasma that deals <DT_VIRAL>Viral damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.

name: Inaros
description: Risen from the sands, Inaros commands the desert's fearsome power.

abilities.name: Desiccation
abilities.description: Blast enemies with a wave of cursed sand that blinds them and steals their health.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Hold power to trap target in quicksand and draw them in for devouring; this steals health and ultimately creates a friendly Sand Shadow.

abilities.name: Sandstorm
abilities.description: Become a whirling spiral of sand that sends enemies flying and devours those trapped in quicksand.

abilities.name: Scarab Swarm
abilities.description: Charge to transform health into hardened scarab armor. Discharge to blast enemies with a scarab swarm; survivors have their health drained and bestowed on allies.

name: Rhino
description: Rhino is the heaviest Warframe, combining offensive and defensive capabilities.

abilities.name: Rhino Charge
abilities.description: Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.

abilities.name: Roar
abilities.description: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.

abilities.name: Rhino Stomp
abilities.description: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.

name: Ivara
description: With her quiver of tactical arrows, this huntress prowls unseen and strikes without warning.

abilities.name: Quiver
abilities.description: Cycle through and shoot one of four tactical arrows: Cloak, Dashwire, Noise and Sleep. In the Conclave, use the Null-Shield and Slow Arrows.

abilities.name: Navigator
abilities.description: Assume control of a projectile and guide it to the target.

abilities.name: Prowl
abilities.description: Become invisible and steal loot from unsuspecting enemies or take out prey with deadly headshots.

abilities.name: Artemis Bow
abilities.description: Summon a mighty bow and unleash a volley of devastating arrows.

name: Harrow
description: Always prepared to sacrifice. This monastic Warframe uses the Void to bolster allies’ defenses and amplify their lethality.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Cast a wave of energy that chains them where they stand. Each enemy held reinforces Harrow’s shields.

abilities.name: Penance
abilities.description: Sacrifice shields to boost reload, and fire rate while converting damage inflicted on enemies into health for Harrow and nearby allies.

abilities.name: Thurible
abilities.description: Channel Harrow’s energy into the Thurible to generate a buff. Once finished, kill enemies to bestow nearby allies with bursts of energy. The more energy channeled the greater the reward for each kill. Headshots produce extra energy.

abilities.name: Covenant
abilities.description: Protect nearby allies with an energy force that absorbs all damage and converts it to a Critical Chance bonus for all those under the Covenant. Headshots are amplified even further.

name: Hydroid
description: Rising from the ocean depths, Hydroid harnesses the power of water to a devastating effect.

abilities.name: Tempest Barrage
abilities.description: Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.description: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.

abilities.name: Tentacle Swarm
abilities.description: Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.

name: Oberon
description: Equally adept at healing friends or striking down the enemy. Oberon embodies the balance Tenno are sworn to uphold.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Hallowed Ground
abilities.description: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.

name: Ash
description: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Project fierce shadow clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies. Join the fray using Teleport.

name: Nezha
description: A petite and playful facade conceals this frame’s immense power.

abilities.name: Fire Walker
abilities.description: Blaze a trail of flames, scorching enemies and cleansing allies.

abilities.name: Blazing Chakram
abilities.description: Hurl a flaming ring that burns enemies and causes them to emit a healing blast on death. Reactivate to instantly travel to the ring's location.

abilities.name: Warding Halo
abilities.description: Create a protective ring of fire, that also stuns and damages enemies who get too close.

abilities.name: Divine Spears
abilities.description: Impale nearby enemies on spears that erupt from the ground.

name: Nekros
description: Nekros uses his dark powers to manipulate his enemies, both living and dead.

abilities.name: Soul Punch
abilities.description: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.description: Cast fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.

abilities.name: Desecrate
abilities.description: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.

abilities.name: Shadows Of The Dead
abilities.description: Summon shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period.

name: Wukong
description: A primal warrior with the heart of a trickster.

abilities.name: Iron Jab
abilities.description: Explode the iron staff to its true length, knocking down anything in its path.

abilities.name: Defy
abilities.description: Escape death by receiving a boost of health when killed.

abilities.name: Cloud Walker
abilities.description: Evaporate into a cloud of mist and float through the battlefield.

abilities.name: Primal Fury
abilities.description: Summon the iron staff and unleash fury.

name: Limbo
description: Limbo manipulates the very planes of existence to divide his enemies and conquer them in the rift.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Casts a wave of Rift energy that damages hostiles while pushing enemies and allies out of Limbo’s current plane of existence.

abilities.name: Stasis
abilities.description: Freezes Rift-bound enemies. While active, weapon fire is arrested in mid-air, resuming its trajectory when Stasis ends.

abilities.name: Rift Surge
abilities.description: Surges nearby Rift-bound enemies with Rift energy. When killed the Rift Surge is transferred to a nearby enemy outside the rift. Surged enemies that leave the Rift perform a radial Banish.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: A violent blast of void energy tears open a pocket of rift plane which can sustain itself for a short period before collapsing in another lethal blast.

name: Mag
description: With full command of surrounding magnetic energy, Mag is an expert at enemy manipulation.

abilities.name: Pull
abilities.description: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.

abilities.name: Polarize
abilities.description: Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.description: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.

name: Loki
description: Desired by advanced players, Loki offers a variety of specialized reconfiguring abilities. The creativity of Loki's powers allows players to master the battlefield through manipulation.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.

abilities.name: Switch Teleport
abilities.description: Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.

abilities.name: Radial Disarm
abilities.description: Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.

name: Khora
description: Tenno and beast, red in whip and claw. Khora and her Kavat companion, Venari, embody lethal versatility. Two bodies, one will.

abilities.name: Whipclaw
abilities.description: Send enemies reeling with a deafening whipcrack.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Bind a hapless target in living metal, entangling others who stray too close. Whipclaw will refresh the trap allowing it to capture more enemies.

abilities.name: Venari
abilities.description: Command Venari to focus on a target. Hold to cycle between Attack, Protect, and Heal postures. If Venari is killed, use this ability to revive her instantly.

abilities.name: Strangledome
abilities.description: Weave a dome of living chain that ensnares and strangles any enemy within, and any foolish enough to approach. Foes outside the trap will try to hasten their comrade's deaths by shooting them. Crack Whipclaw on the dome to further damage any trapped enemies.

name: Nyx
description: Mind control and psychic attacks make Nyx a very dangerous foe. Her ability to reach into enemy consciousness and manipulate their behavior can turn the tide of battle.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.

abilities.name: Psychic Bolts
abilities.description: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.

abilities.name: Chaos
abilities.description: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.

abilities.name: Absorb
abilities.description: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.

name: Nidus
description: Command the Infestation to mutate and grow ever more destructive.

abilities.name: Virulence
abilities.description: Rupture the ground with a damaging fungal growth that steals energy from each enemy it strikes. For every five enemies hit, the Infestation mutates, multiplying its destructive force.

abilities.name: Larva
abilities.description: Spawn an Infested pod that erupts with tendrils, latches onto nearby enemies and pulls them in.

abilities.name: Parasitic Link
abilities.description: Bind to a target with a parasitic link. For allies, both the host and Nidus deal increased damage. Linked enemies take the damage inflicted on Nidus.

abilities.name: Ravenous
abilities.description: Gluttonous maggots swarm nearby enemies, feasting until they are hit with Virulence and burst with Infestation. The maggots benefit from Mutation and each enemy hit adds to the Mutation stack.

name: Mirage
description: A master of illusion, Mirage confounds the enemy in a spectacle of style and power.

abilities.name: Hall Of Mirrors
abilities.description: Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.

abilities.name: Sleight Of Hand
abilities.description: Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.

abilities.name: Prism
abilities.description: Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.

name: Gara
description: The battlefield trembles before Gara's crystalline power, her ringing touch transforming opponents to targets of brittle beauty.

abilities.name: Shattered Lash
abilities.description: Lash out with stream of shattered glass, or hold for an arcing strike.

abilities.name: Splinter Storm
abilities.description: Gara’s armor splinters into a maelstrom of shattered glass. Allies who contact the cloud are fortified against damage.

abilities.name: Spectrorage
abilities.description: Trap enemies in a carousel of mirrors, forcing them to attack visions of their true selves. Destroyed mirrors damage their attackers, as does the collapse of the carousel.

abilities.name: Mass Vitrify
abilities.description: Create an expanding ring of molten glass that slowly crystallizes enemies who enter. When the expansion is complete, the ring hardens to block weapons fire. The ring draws extra strength from the health and shields of crystallized enemies. Use Shattered Lash to smash the ring and send razor-sharp glass flying outward.

name: Frost
description: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub zero conditions.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.

abilities.name: Ice Wave
abilities.description: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystalized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.

abilities.name: Snow Globe
abilities.description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.

name: Titania
description: Take flight with this mischievous pixie.

abilities.name: Spellbind
abilities.description: Enemies fumble their weapons as they are whisked into the air. Nearby allies become immune to Status Effects.

abilities.name: Tribute
abilities.description: Extract an offering from an enemy in the form of a random Ability Buff. Survivor’s attacks are weakened.

abilities.name: Lantern
abilities.description: Create a swarm of razorflies that transform an enemy into an irresistible floating beacon, attracting witless comrades and finally exploding.

abilities.name: Razorwing
abilities.description: Shrink down and take flight, while razorflies attack nearby enemies.

name: Excalibur
description: A perfect balance of mobility and offense, Excalibur is the ideal Warframe for new players.

abilities.name: Slash Dash
abilities.description: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.

abilities.name: Radial Blind
abilities.description: Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.

abilities.name: Radial Javelin
abilities.description: Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.

abilities.name: Exalted Blade
abilities.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.

name: Ember
description: Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets. Ember can super-heat the air which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.

abilities.name: Accelerant
abilities.description: Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.

abilities.name: Fire Blast
abilities.description: Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.

abilities.name: World On Fire
abilities.description: Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.

name: Chroma
description: A master of the deadly elements, Chroma can alter his damage output by changing his energy color.

abilities.name: Spectral Scream
abilities.description: Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Chroma's energy color determines the element.

abilities.name: Elemental Ward
abilities.description: Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created. Chroma and its nearby allies are imbued with defensive energy.

abilities.name: Vex Armor
abilities.description: When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases.

abilities.name: Effigy
abilities.description: Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.

name: Mesa
description: With a steady hand and quick reflexes, Mesa is a true gunfighter.

abilities.name: Ballistic Battery
abilities.description: When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channelled through the next gunshot.

abilities.name: Shooting Gallery
abilities.description: Gives an ally extra damage while jamming the guns of nearby enemies. This power shifts between team members.

abilities.name: Shatter Shield
abilities.description: Envelops Mesa in a barrier of energy, reflecting back incoming bullet damage.

abilities.name: Peacemaker
abilities.description: With intense focus, Mesa draws her Regulator pistols, shooting down her foes in rapid succession.

name: Atlas
description: Titan of stone, lord of the earthly elementals.

abilities.name: Landslide
abilities.description: Bash enemies with an explosive sliding punch, and repeat for a devastating combo. Petrified enemies take extra damage, and drop Rubble when destroyed. Rubble can heal Atlas and bolster his armor.

abilities.name: Tectonics
abilities.description: Summon a rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing toward the enemy.

abilities.name: Petrify
abilities.description: Atlas' hardened gaze will fossilize foes, heal Rumblers, and create Petrified Bulwarks. When shattered, petrified enemies drop healing Rubble for Atlas.

abilities.name: Rumblers
abilities.description: Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee. Summoning petrifies enemies in close proximity to Atlas. When finished, Rumblers collapse into a pile of healing Rubble.

name: Valkyr
description: Forged in the labs of the Zanuka project, the original Valkyr was subject to cruel experiments, leaving her scarred, angry and frighteningly adept at killing.

abilities.name: Rip Line
abilities.description: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Paralysis
abilities.description: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.

abilities.name: Hysteria
abilities.description: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of vicious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.

name: Octavia
description: Compose her song and then conduct the mighty Mandachord, turning bass, beat and melody into an anthem of devastation.

abilities.name: Mallet
abilities.description: Rhythmically beats damage into nearby enemies and draws their fire. Damage inflicted on the Mallet increases its lethality.

abilities.name: Resonator
abilities.description: Launches a rollerball that charms foes to follow it. Combines with the Mallet to create a roving ball of sonic destruction.

abilities.name: Metronome
abilities.description: Grants buffs to those who consistently perform actions in time to Octavia’s music. Timed jumps offer the Vivace speed buff. Crouching on the beat grants cloaking with the Nocturne buff. Firing rhythmically bestows Opera multishot buff. Timed melee swings give the Forte damage buff.

abilities.name: Amp
abilities.description: Draws power from the decibel level of sound in the area and uses it to amplify a damage buff for Octavia and her allies. It also doubles the damage and range of nearby Mallets.

name: Banshee
description: Using sonic attacks and acoustic target detection, Banshee is well suited for stealth gameplay and is capable of filling both attack and support roles.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.description: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.

abilities.name: Sonar
abilities.description: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.

abilities.name: Sound Quake
abilities.description: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.

name: Nova
description: Nova uses electromagnetic energy to contain and control highly volatile antimatter that fuels her abilities.

abilities.name: Null Star
abilities.description: Creates antimatter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets. Each active particle gives +5% damage reduction to Nova's health, stacking up to 90%.

abilities.name: Antimatter Drop
abilities.description: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision with increased deadliness when targeted by weapons.

abilities.name: Worm Hole
abilities.description: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.

abilities.name: Molecular Prime
abilities.description: Primes all enemies in a radius with volatile antimatter.

name: Mara Detron
description: For Orokin-era smugglers, this fearsome handheld shotgun was a favored tool for 'dispute resolution'.

name: Hikou
description: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do less damage but they come with expanded ammo capacity and a higher rate of fire.

name: Despair
description: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.

name: Kunai
description: Kunai throwing daggers offer a silent alternative to the traditional side arm. Perfect for assassins.

name: Talons
description: The claws of these tactical bombs dig into the target and detonate on command.

name: Castanas
description: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.

name: Spira
description: A flash of red ribbon is the last thing most victims of these throwing-daggers see.

name: Fusilai
description: Silently lacerate enemies with Gara’s signature glass throwing knives.

name: Knell
description: Ring the death knell. Headshots briefly turn this scoped pistol into a rapid-fire, Crit Damage fiend that uses no ammo.

name: Zakti
description: Fires razor-sharp darts that anchor themselves in their target before erupting in a plume of toxic gas.

name: Pandero
description: Octavia’s pistol hammers foes with single shots or a rapid volley of bullets.

name: Akjagara
description: The design of these hard-hitting dual pistols is a mix of organic and bladed elements.

name: Akstiletto
description: These diminutive rapid-fire Stiletto machine-pistols are just the right size to be akimbo style without sacrificing accuracy.

name: Azima
description: This intricate automatic pistol is able to fire its clip which then spins in the air for a short time, firing lasers at nearby enemies.

name: Aksomati
description: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.

name: Pyrana
description: Chew through the enemy with this vicious automatic hand shotgun.

name: Hystrix
description: Fire, ice, electricity, or poison: choose an element and launch a flurry deadly quills. This versatile sidearm is Khora’s signature weapon.

name: Magnus
description: The versatile Magnus revolver is a lethal sidearm for any Tenno.

name: Akzani
description: The choice weapon of Mirage, these fast-firing dual pistols deliver a deadly performance.

name: Dex Furis
description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.

name: Ballistica
description: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.

name: Vasto
description: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.

name: Lato
description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere.

name: Lex
description: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

name: Bronco
description: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited clip size.

name: Bolto
description: The Bolto fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.

name: Sicarus
description: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

name: Furis
description: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.

name: Akvasto
description: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.

name: Akmagnus
description: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.

name: Twin Vipers
description: A Viper equipped in each hand.

name: Akbronco
description: A Bronco equipped in each hand.

name: Aklato
description: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

name: Akbolto
description: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and slightly faster fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

name: Afuris
description: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and slightly faster fire rate, but accuracy and reload speed are lowered.

name: Aklex
description: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.

name: Gammacor
description: Designed to quickly vaporize minerals for content analysis, users discovered its powerful beam was equally efficient at dispatching hostiles.

name: Mk1-Kunai
description: The MK1-Kunai is the standard issue throwing knives for all Tenno.

name: Mk1-Furis
description: The MK1-Furis are the standard issue automatic pistol for all Tenno.

name: Embolist
description: A living weapon, the infested Embolist pistol kills its victims with an acidic venomous gas.

name: Tysis
description: The Tysis pistol spits out caustic darts that corrode their victims from within.

name: Dual Toxocyst
description: Brain-strikes excite this bioweapon, causing it to rapidly release toxic munitions.

name: Pox
description: These festering sacs of pus and gas burst violently on impact.

name: Atomos
description: This particle cannon generates a condensed beam of super-heated plasma designed to melt rock to ore, and enemies to molten slag.

name: Stubba
description: Inflict rapid-fire bursts of pain with this Grineer submachine gun.

name: Kulstar
description: Rain hell on the enemy with this handheld cluster-rocket launcher.

name: Twin Rogga
description: These twin barrels of destruction are the signature pistols of the Kuva Guardians.

name: Kohmak
description: Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with each successive shot.

name: Twin Kohmak
description: Doubling their volley on each successive shot, the Twin Kohmaks decimate foes in seconds.

name: Nukor
description: Creates and focuses a high-frequency field of microwaves, literally cooking the target from within.

name: Marelok
description: The Marelok combines the stopping power of a rifle with the portability of a pistol.

name: Brakk
description: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.

name: Stug
description: Firing a sticky, toxic, explosive compound, the Stug Gel Gun offers multiple ejection modes, delivering maximum damage in all situations.

name: Twin Grakatas
description: When one Grakata isn't enough, bring another for extra firepower.

name: Seer
description: Captain Vor's prized Orokin-Grineer hybrid pistol has an average rate of fire, but it has high damage and superior zoom capabilities.

name: Kraken
description: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires two quick shots with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.

name: Viper
description: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small clip size, the Viper has a very high fire rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.

name: Twin Gremlins
description: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.

name: Arca Scisco
description: This scoped pistol analyzes strikes, learning how to damage its targets most effectively. Achieve maximum damage output after five successive hits.

name: Prisma Angstrum
description: Imbued with the finest Prisma crystal, this refined Angstrum features boosted charge and reload speeds.

name: Angstrum
description: Capable of firing multiple rockets at once, the Angstrum is a handheld instrument of destruction.

name: Staticor
description: Send a massive charge of potential energy hurling toward unfortunate targets.

name: Cycron
description: Forgo ammunition with the regenerating energy disc in this plasma throwing pistol.

name: Sonicor
description: Blasts targets with a massive wave of sonic energy. Results reported to be: 'Very Satisfying'.

name: Dual Cestra
description: Wield two Cestras to unleash a dual torrent of high energy bolts.

name: Cestra
description: Compact and deadly, the Cestra discharges bolts of energy at an increasingly rapid rate.

name: Detron
description: The sleek lines of the Detron conceal its ferocious nature. The hand cannon's semi-automatic action takes down enemies with speed and efficiency.

name: Spectra
description: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.

name: Acrid
description: The Acrid fires an acidic-infused needle.

name: Sweeper
description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

name: Deconstructor
description: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack enemy targets using pieces of itself.

name: Vulklok
description: Standard issue sniper rifle for Diriga.

name: Stinger
description: Standard issue weapon for Djinn Sentinel. Fires poisonous projectiles.

name: Prisma Burst Laser
description: Fires a small burst of lasers.

name: Laser Rifle
description: A laser rifle developed by reverse-engineering Corpus technology.

name: Artax
description: Freeze targets in their tracks with this sentinel mounted ice-beam.

name: Deth Machine Rifle
description: Standard issue weaponry signature to Dethcube.

name: Burst Laser
description: Fires a small burst of lasers.

name: Prisma Skana
description: Forged from raw prisma crystals and infused with void energy, this blade's pristine edge is honed razor-sharp to eviscerate even the most deadly of foes.

name: Gunsen
description: Lacerate attackers with two razor sharp warfans.

name: Kronen
description: The Kronen resurrects a lethal fighting style once thought lost to the ages.

name: Boltace
description: An intimidating Tonfa set designed to match the briary design of the Boltor.

name: Sigma & Octantis
description: Deadly slashes from the Sigma sword are matched only by the force of the Octantis shield when thrown from the air.

name: Silva & Aegis
description: This fiery sword and shield combination perfects the balance of Tenno offense and defense prowess. In the hands of a Master, even a defensive tool like a shield can be used as a weapon.

name: Destreza
description: Elevate martial combat into an art form with this Tenno rapier.

name: Endura
description: The delicate form of this Tenno rapier conceals its ferocious and resilient force.

name: Okina
description: Perforate enemies with these two needle-sharp sai.

name: Broken War
description: A fragment of Stalker's War sword, a symbol of his defeat.

name: War
description: The Stalker's sword as bestowed on him by the Sentient Hunhow.

name: Lacera
description: In the practiced hands of a master, this blade and whip becomes exceedingly devastating.

name: Dual Keres
description: Tear through any target with these vicious, claw-like blades. The signature swords of Khora.

name: Plasma Sword
description: An advanced blade that delivers high-damage attacks. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.

name: Pangolin Sword
description: A unique blade used by an old Tenno clan.

name: Karyst
description: Once the blade weapon of choice for an exclusive order of Tenno assassins, the Karyst dagger grew to become a symbol of honor and duty for all Tenno.

name: Dragon Nikana
description: The Dragon Nikana is forged from ancient Tenno steel. This is a master's weapon, only the most worthy of Tenno may wield it.

name: Nikana
description: The Nikana katana reintroduces a lost Tenno blade and with it another fragment of the old ways.

name: Jaw Sword
description: A blade with a serrated edge that delivers strong quick attacks.

name: Heat Sword
description: A strong blade capable of inflicting <DT_SLASH>Slash damage to its foes.

name: Galatine
description: With massive charged power and the ability to hit up to five foes in a single swing, the Galatine sword is the heavy artillery of melee weapons.

name: Dex Dakra
description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.

name: Dark Split-Sword
description: Use as a devastating heavy sword or apply a Dual Melee stance and split the weapon into two ferocious blades.

name: Dark Sword
description: A blade forged using dark metals, capable of delivering innate Radiation damage with attacks.

name: Nami Solo
description: Evoking the oceans of earth, this exquisite cutlass is a deadly work of art.

name: Nami Skyla
description: Like the surge and crash of storm waves, a master of the Nami cutlass and Skyla dagger turns these two separate weapons into one fluid attack.

name: Zenistar
description: Scorch enemies with blistering blows, or set them ablaze with the flying fire disc.

name: Bo
description: A two-handed, reinforced staff that can send multiple enemies airborne.

name: Amphis
description: Fashioned with Grineer materials and balanced for marine infantry use, the Amphis is a traditional staff weapon that has received a monstrous makeover that enables shock damage on jump attacks. Connects with multiple enemies with each strike.

name: Tipedo
description: With its crescent shaped blades flying in sweeping arcs and striking at tremendous speed, the Tipedo demands focus from those wishing to unlock its true power.

name: Dual Raza
description: Razor sharp battle-hatchets, designed to compliment the Soma.

name: Hate
description: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.

name: Ether Reaper
description: With a blade forged from the same material as the Ether Sword, the Ether Reaper delivers quick death to its victims.

name: Anku
description: Reap havoc with this full sized Tenno-crafted scythe.

name: Orthos
description: The Tenno forged Orthos is a rare double bladed polearm. Those who take the time to master it speak of its impressive striking distance and ability to hit multiple targets.

name: Cassowar
description: Light and nimble, the twin blades of this polearm will swoop and slice through throngs of hardened foes.

name: Guandao
description: Harvest the enemy with this towering polearm.

name: Tonbo
description: During the darkest days of the Old War many a Tenno relied solely on the Tonbo to keep them alive.

name: Gazal Machete
description: Each kill with this swooping blade adds bonus damage to the Djinn Sentinel’s next Fatal Attraction ability. In turn, Fatal Attraction bestows the weapon with a period of corrosive damage.

name: Shaku
description: With these blazing fast nunchaku, the enemy will never know what hit them.

name: Ninkondi
description: With its lightning-fast strikes, the Ninkondi pays respect to the old ways.

name: Magistar
description: The Magistar mace wields justice and truth in the form of bone-crushing blows.

name: Skana
description: Before all other weapons, Tenno master the Skana. This simple blade becomes immensely powerful in the hands of a master. For Tenno, it is the foundation of their fighting style and a pillar of their culture.

name: Ether Sword
description: A single blade for more precision. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies.

name: Fragor
description: A large two-handed hammer, the Fragor requires great strength to wield, but impacts with enough force to send groups of enemies tumbling.

name: Sibear
description: Ice in motion can crush mountains, this frozen hammer is no different.

name: Volnus
description: Tear and maim with this agile, lightweight glass hammer. Gara’s signature melee weapon.

name: Redeemer
description: Striking with massive twin blades, the Redeemer fires the killing blow with its built-in shotgun.

name: Sarpa
description: Makes sweeping cuts punctuated by bursts of heavy gunfire.

name: Gram
description: The heavy two-handed sword known as Gram requires great strength to wield, but it is notorious for its splitting power. Can hit multiple targets with each strike.

name: Orvius
description: Turn foes into puppets with Teshin’s versatile throwing disc.

name: Glaive
description: Dating back to the time of the first Tenno, the Glaive is a uniquely deadly weapon. This multi-bladed disc is not only effective for melee combat; it can also be thrown like a boomerang to cut down enemies at a distance.

name: Kestrel
description: The Kestrel boomerang is a heavy throwing weapon that can knock down enemies at a distance.

name: Ankyros
description: A pair of mighty gauntlets, the Ankyros were designed by the Tenno for close quarters combat. What they lack in range they make up for in speed.

name: Tekko
description: These iron fists that rip through foes with each strike are Atlas' signature weapon.

name: Furax
description: These power gauntlets lack the range of most melee weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.

name: Dual Skana
description: A shorter Skana in each hand. Can hit multiple targets.

name: Dual Heat Swords
description: With a Heat Sword in each hand, enemies reach their fiery demise twice as fast. Can connect with multiple targets at once.

name: Dual Ether
description: Fast and precise. The Dual Ether cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies. Capable of hitting multiple targets.

name: Kama
description: The Kama is a Tenno style hatchet, capable of making short work of any foe.

name: Dual Kamas
description: Wielding a Kama in each hand brings a savage amount of slash damage to bear against your enemies.

name: Ether Daggers
description: A shorter version of the Ether blade that allows for a more focused attack on a single target.

name: Fang
description: These matching stilettos have increased attack speed and can unleash a flurry of multi-hit attacks.

name: Dark Dagger
description: This short blade weapon forged using dark metals has limited range but comes out fast.

name: Heat Dagger
description: This short blade weapon has limited range but comes out fast and can inflict fire damage.

name: Ceramic Dagger
description: This short blade weapon was built using ceramic. It has limited range but comes out fast.

name: Cronus
description: A strong blade forged using ceramic.

name: Venka
description: Utilizing a new fighting stance, this Tenno weapon turns fists into claws and enemies into messy piles of meat and scrap metal.

name: Kogake
description: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.

name: Dual Ichor
description: The fast and brutal Dual Ichor axes will quickly tear through enemies with a high probability of inflicting critical damage.

name: Dual Zoren
description: Short axes held in each hand. High attack speed and can hit multiple targets. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.

name: Scindo
description: The Scindo is a heavy war axe crafted by the Tenno. Reduced speed and agility is balanced by heavy, devastating strikes capable of connecting with multiple targets at once.

name: Zaw
description: A custom weapon made from many possible parts. Assembled only by Hok in Cetus.

name: Mk1-Furax
description: The MK1-Furax is the standard issue fist weapon for all Tenno.

name: Mk1-Bo
description: The MK1-Bo is the standard issue staff weapon for all Tenno.

name: Scoliac
description: The Scoliac Whip is a nasty parasitic growth of sinew and bone that can inflict heart stopping <DT_POISON>Toxin damage with attacks.

name: Lesion
description: An instrument of unrelenting harm.

name: Mire
description: A relic from the Great Plague, the Mire Infested Sword is a brutal weapon. It not only cuts into the enemy, it infects the wounds of its victim with a toxic nerve poison. Deals <DT_POISON> Toxin damage on ground slam attacks.

name: Mios
description: This bone-forged sword includes a tendon-whip to distract and maim the enemy.

name: Hirudo
description: Rip into the enemy with fists of razor sharp cartilage. Steals health with each critical hit.

name: Caustacyst
description: Charge attacks from this scythe unleash a wave of acid that mutilates enemies and leaves a trail of corrosive sludge.

name: Cerata
description: Twisted and tortured from exposure to the Infestation, this glaive becomes an absolute predator in the hands of the right Tenno.

name: Sydon
description: Inflict maximum devastation with this massive Grineer trident.

name: Broken Scepter
description: A shattered talisman of the Grineer Elder Queen. It pulls health orbs from deceased enemies and energy orbs from destroyed robots.

name: Jat Kusar
description: Overwhelm hostiles with this jet-powered sickle and razor-chain weapon. Charged strikes ignite an explosive blast at range.

name: Krohkur
description: This hooked blade rewards critical hits to those skilled enough to strike with finesse.

name: Twin Krohkur
description: Battlefield butchery becomes all too easy with a Krohkur blade in each hand.

name: Twin Basolk
description: These nasty, little hatchets slice through steel as if it were flesh.

name: Halikar
description: This jet powered Grineer throwing mace always comes back to its master and is even capable of disarming targets.

name: Atterax
description: A multi-bladed whip that is adept at flaying skin from bone. In extreme cases, disobedient Grineer are sentenced to death by Atterax.

name: Ack & Brunt
description: Tyl Regor’s custom axe and shield are how he likes to eliminate ‘frustrations’.

name: Prisma Machete
description: The addition of Prisma Crystal allows this otherwise barbaric weapon to elegantly hack through any foe.

name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
description: Blades of energized prisma crystal make these ornamental cleavers cut as sharply as they look.

name: Machete
description: A ferocious melee weapon crafted by the Grineer and carried by their elite melee forces.

name: Dual Cleavers
description: Butcher your foes with brutal blades in each hand.

name: Jat Kittag
description: Deliver crushing blows with this Grineer built, jet powered mace.

name: Kesheg
description: Slice through mobs of unruly enemies with this fierce halberd; the signature weapon of the Kuva Guardians.

name: Sheev
description: Built for close combat, the Sheev's plasma blade slices through flesh and armor with equal ease.

name: Ripkas
description: Motorized saw claw weapon.

name: Lecta
description: Half taser, half whip. The Corpus Lecta delivers a deadly shock to anything it touches.

name: Serro
description: Developed as an energy saw to scrap obsolete ships, this tool was quickly banned when rebels in the Sedna region discovered it also made an excellent weapon.

name: Prisma Obex
description: Dazzle, distract and destroy with these sparring weapons of impossibly hard prisma crystal.

name: Obex
description: The Obex system multiplies the kinetic energy of a Tenno's kicks and punches, delivering devastating blows to any target.

name: Arca Titron
description: Each successive kill from this massive electron hammer builds an electron charge that is unleashed on slam attacks.

name: Ohma
description: Bring the enemy to its knees with these twin electrified tonfas.

name: Prova
description: The Prova is a melee weapon that delivers a high-intensity shock to its target.

name: Heliocor
description: Obtain enlightenment with this massive hammer that performs a Codex scan on each fatal strike. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.

name: Prisma Grakata
description: Encased in plates refined from pure prisma crystals, this rare element gives this assault rifle a radiant luster.

name: Strun
description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.

name: Hek
description: The Hek is a powerful shotgun that fires its shots with a tight spread, making it efficient at medium range as long as its strong recoil is properly managed.

name: Boar
description: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.

name: Sobek
description: Sobek is a rapid-firing Grineer shotgun that has reduced damage per shot but boasts extra large clip capacity.

name: Vectis
description: A classic Tenno sniper rifle, the Vectis is ideal for ranged takedowns.

name: Soma
description: Accuracy coupled with a massive clip makes the Soma assault rifle a formidable weapon.

name: Mk1-Braton
description: The MK1-Braton is the standard issue rifle for all Tenno. A versatile weapon that can be customized to support a wide variety of play styles.

name: Snipetron
description: Manufactured by the Corpus, the Snipetron is a powerful and accurate rifle that sports optical zoom capabilities. Perfect for long range engagements.

name: Latron
description: The Latron is a highly efficient rifle that performs well at medium and at long range, its accuracy making it a deadly weapon in the hands of skilled marksmen.

name: Braton
description: The Braton's high rate of fire and accuracy make it a favorite among the Tenno.

name: Gorgon
description: The Gorgon sports a large clip that allows it to provide suppressing fire and sustain a high damage rate over a long time. Its high fire rate is only achieved following a short wind-up cycle.

name: Burston
description: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.

name: Boltor
description: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.

name: Attica
description: Quickly fire off a volley of deadly bolts with the Attica repeating crossbow.

name: Sybaris
description: This Tenno crafted, lever action rifle, is equal parts elegance and executioner.

name: Baza
description: Make easy prey of enemies with this quiet, agile, and pinpoint accurate Tenno submachine gun.

name: Veldt
description: Precise calibration, rapid trigger-pull and a steady hand all combine to bring down the hardiest prey on two legs or four.

name: Scourge
description: Blast targets with corrosive plasma projectiles, or toss the scepter to inflict an energy field upon nearby enemies that amplifies their brain waves to attract bullets.

name: Corinth
description: Deliver a massive punch with each blast of this shotgun, or launch a round that explodes mid-air knocking down nearby enemies.

name: Astilla
description: Blast enemies with glass slugs that devastate on impact. This is Gara’s signature weapon.

name: Tenora
description: Unload percussive machine gun fire, or strike a heavy chord with a single charge shot. This is Octavia’s signature rifle.

name: Stradavar
description: A high-capacity, high-damage enforcer, this weapon can switch between the high crit semi-automatic and full automatic firing modes.

name: Zhuge
description: This devastating automatic crossbow is the perfect marriage of ancient Earth weaponry and Tenno technology.

name: Panthera
description: Firing high-velocity blades, this weapon can also be used as a battle-saw, shredding anything unfortunate enough to get within range.

name: Zenith
description: Deploy the radar disc to reveal hidden enemies and then strike with precisions shots that punch through all obstacles in the way.

name: Rubico
description: Scope out the enemy with this long-range revolver style rifle.

name: Tiberon
description: Forged by a master gunsmith, this Tenno burst rifle will strike down targets with swift precision.

name: Tigris
description: The double-barreled Tigris shotgun fires two bursts in rapid succession, easily taking down the toughest prey.

name: Dex Sybaris
description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the third anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.

name: Dread
description: Dread is the calling card of The Stalker. It fires arrows that can decapitate.

name: Paris
description: Based on one of the world's oldest weapon designs, this Tenno-crafted weapon can be used both in stealth and in open combat. The Paris uses a chargeable magnetic field to launch arrows capable of impaling enemies to walls.

name: Daikyu
description: Daikyu takes great strength to draw back, but provides added power and range to every shot.

name: Cernos
description: Evoking the design of ancient bows, the high impact Cernos is perfect for hunting down highly shielded enemies.

name: Mk1-Strun
description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.

name: Mk1-Paris
description: The MK1-Paris is the standard issue bow for all Tenno.

name: Synapse
description: Powered by a bio-chemical reaction, the infested Synapse rifle fries its targets with a steady stream of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive energy.

name: Phage
description: Fires seven beams of continuous biochemical energy which depletes the life of any surface they contact.

name: Paracyst
description: Completely overwhelmed by Infested biology, this former Quanta now fires organic ordnance and a harpoon like appendage.

name: Hema
description: A bloodsucker. This symbiotic burst-rifle leeches health to forge its ammo and then restores health with each headshot.

name: Mutalist Quanta
description: A bizarre union of Corpus technology and Infested biology, this automatic rifle can also deploy an irradiated airborne infested mass. Further field testing is required to fully understand the potential of this weapon.

name: Mutalist Cernos
description: Overcome with Infestation, this bow's arrows now spread poisonous contagion to any surface they hit.

name: Prisma Gorgon
description: Adorned with void hardened prisma crystal, this Gorgon variant is prized for its beauty and enhanced mechanics.

name: Argonak
description: Pick off targets by highlighting distant enemies using this Grineer rifle's advanced laser sighting system. Deadly in both single fire and automatic modes.

name: Kohm
description: For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.

name: Harpak
description: Spike enemies to the wall or reel them in with this burst harpoon gun.

name: Tonkor
description: Hurl mayhem and destruction with this Grineer grenade launcher.

name: Buzlok
description: Mark your targets and unleash a barrage of bullets, the Buzlok's homing rounds always find the enemy. Marked targets are more likely to take critical hits.

name: Quartakk
description: Annihilate targets with four simultaneous shots from this high-caliber Grineer rifle.

name: Javlok
description: Launch super-heated slugs at individual foes, or hurl the entire weapon and ignite groups of enemies in a flash inferno.

name: Zarr
description: Unload a barrage of explosives or a huge shot of flak from this cannon’s enormous barrel.

name: Vulkar
description: Built by the Grineer for their elite troopers, the Vulkar is a devastating distance weapon. In the right hands it is capable of taking down targets long before they get into attack range.

name: Miter
description: The MITER launches high velocity saw blades, tearing apart anyone unfortunate enough to be in their path.

name: Karak
description: Solid, dependable and deadly. The Karak is a standard issue rifle in many Grineer platoons.

name: Grinlok
description: With pinpoint accuracy, the Grinlok lever-action repeating rifle can easily find the soft spot on any target.

name: Drakgoon
description: The Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.

name: Grakata
description: Equipped with a huge magazine and impressive fire rate, the Grakata is the preferred weapon of Grineer Lancers.

name: Hind
description: A powerful mid-range rifle used by Grineer shock troops, the Hind fires in five round bursts.

name: Ferrox
description: Discharge a rail of ionized death or throw the Ferrox like a spear and create a localized field of attraction no enemy can escape from.

name: Penta
description: The Penta Launcher fires up to five grenades that can be remotely triggered at just the right moment.

name: Convectrix
description: When its twin-lasers converge on a target a circuit is created, frying the subject.

name: Arca Plasmor
description: Stagger targets with blasts from this Corpus engineered plasma shotgun. Surviving enemies are consumed with radiation.

name: Quanta
description: This weapon was designed to assist with the excavation of mineral deposits from large asteroids, but has been adapted for military purposes.

name: Glaxion
description: Fires a photon beam that halts molecular vibrations, causing instant and painful freezing.

name: Opticor
description: Once charged this Corpus laser cannon dispatches a devastating blast of light energy.

name: Prisma Tetra
description: When bathed in void energy and prisma crystal, the simple Tetra becomes a beacon of style and intimidation.

name: Tetra
description: Drawing from its huge quad-chambered clip, the Tetra is capable of unleashing a sustained barrage of lethal energy bolts.

name: Amprex
description: The Amprex rifle fires a continuous beam of high voltage electricity that arcs among nearby enemies. This weapon excels at crowd control.

name: Lenz
description:
Bolts from this Corpus bow deliver a one-two punch of an icy pulse, followed by a conventional explosion. Excess ammo picked up for other weapons will be converted into charges for the Lenz. 
Warning: Safety-protocols do not exist on this prototype.

name: Lanka
description: The Lanka fires a high velocity projectile through magnetic induction.

name: Dera
description: The DERA is a repeater that fires super-heated plasma.

name: Flux Rifle
description: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.

name: Supra
description: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.

name: Ogris
description: Ogris fires detonite-infused casings.

name: Ignis
description: Ignis produces a stream of intense heat.

name: Torid
description: Torid lobs a toxic payload.

name: Simulor
description: Creates miniature gravitational singularities that can be used for scientific study or self-defense.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Small)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 35 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Small)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 30 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Small)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 30 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Small)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 25 Energy every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Small)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 30 Rifle, 15 Pistol, 12 Shotgun, 5 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Large)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 300 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Large)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 300 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Large)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 100 Energy every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Large)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 110 Rifle, 60 Pistol, 50 Shotgun, 30 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Sniper Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of sniper ammo.

name: Shotgun Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of shotgun ammo.

name: Shield Restore (Small)
description: Instantly restores 50 Shield.

name: Rifle Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of rifle ammo.

name: Pistol Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of pistol ammo.

name: Omni Ammo Box
description: Fully restores all ammo types.

name: Health Restore (Small)
description: Instantly restores 50 Health.

name: Health Restore (Large)
description: Instantly restores your Health to full.

name: Archwing Launcher
description: Summons an Archwing for use during free roam missions.

name: Sentry Gun
description: Ordis delivers an automatic turret that will fire upon nearby visible enemies.

name: Snow Globe
description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

name: Med-Tower
description: Ordis delivers a Med-Tower to restore health to nearby allies.

name: Laserturret
description: Launches homing missiles

name: Vortex
description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter

name: Carpet Bomb
description: Ordis drops bombs in a line from your position to the beacon you placed.

name: Override
description: Ordis hacks into enemy systems and disrupts security protocols for a short period.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 80 Rifle, 45 Pistol, 35 Shotgun, 20 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Air Support Charges
description: Charges consumed by Landing Craft Air Support.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 100 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 100 Health every 5s for 20s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 50 Energy every 5s for 20s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 80 Rifle, 45 Pistol, 35 Shotgun, 20 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Cipher
description: Single-use device used for auto-hacking the lockdown control panels.

name: Hobbled Dragon Key
description: Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Decaying Dragon Key
description: Shields are greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Bleeding Dragon Key
description: Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Extinguished Dragon Key
description: Damage is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Twilight Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Nightfall Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Sunrise Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Eros Arrow Skin
description: Show the enemy how much you care with the adorable Eros Arrow skin. Works with all bows.

name: Stable Corruptor
description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

name: Phase Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Phase Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Shield Osprey Specter
description: Deploys a SHIELD OSPREY EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Codex Scanner
description: Samples a target of interest for later analysis in your Codex (25 charges).

name: Roller Specter
description: Deploys a ROLLER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Razorback Cipher
description: Used to bypass security systems that protect the Razorback's holding cell.

name: Cosmic Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Cosmic Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Moa Specter
description: Deploys a MOA EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Scorpion Specter
description: Deploys a SCORPION EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: [Ph] Mining Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a mining icon at your position

name: [Ph] Fishing Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a fishing icon at your position

name: [Ph] Combat Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a combat icon at your position

name: Synthesis Scanner
description: Synthesize a genetic data of the target and uploads it to the Sanctuary.

name: Antiserum Injector
description: Injects antiserum into Vaporizers or the user to prevent armor degradation.

name: Potent Pherliac Pods
description: Creates 50x Potent Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.

name: Pherliac Pods
description: Creates 50x Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.

name: Kinetic Siphon Trap
description: Specialized trap for attracting and slowing the movement of synthesis targets.

name: Force Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Force Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Fomorian Disruptor
description: When activated, it disrupts a Fomorian core's Omega energy field, making it vulnerable. Also shields Tenno from Omega radiation.

name: Starburst
description: Celebrate the holiday with fireworks! Light up the sky with this single use consumable item.
